content.prompt: Baconâ€™s Rebellion occurred because of disagreements between frontier settlers and the Virginia governor over which of the following issues?

choices.label: Relations with American Indians and restrictions on the fur trade
An increase in taxes to subsidize the slave trade and support internal improvements
The assignment of Anglican ministers to new settlements
Currency disputes resulting from English demands that settlers end the use of barter
The drafting of settlers into the English army

topic.text: 2.5: Interactions Between American Indians and Europeans

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
